title: Championship Thresh Skin and Figure Bundle gone...
body: I was looking forward to buying this and getting not only the Championship Thresh skin, which is one I'm missing, but also the little figure of my favorite champion. When I got my check deposited and went to purchase it, I cant find it anywhere. Was it only available the week leading up to, or is it going to be released today? Anyone able to shed some light on this for me?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

The Championship Thresh figure was available this morning, but is now out of stock. Due to high demand, a restock will happen during Worlds and we will message the date/time in advance.
were will this message be posted at :p?
We're still working through the best spot, aside from the merch page, of course. :]
How often will you guys be able to restock CS Thresh? Until now it's been the only figure I've wanted...
He'll only be available until the end of the month. We're working to restock now - not sure if it's the only time. (I'm just the messenger on this one!)
I hope it's not the only time. Don't want a repeat of urf ;-;
maybe have a riotgames twitter account for merch :P? so u can promote new items and give updates?
@jingofalltrades posts a lot of the new merch. :]
I would love to buy one asap! i've had the money all along but it sold out both times in the matter of afew hours :( Please restock!
hi. i'm in viet nam and i'd like to buy  The Championship Thresh figure. Can you ship it in viet nam ?
Ugh I missed out on this one, I hope the restock is soon...
i was awake at 1 in the morning to buy one of these but i feel asleep

I'll be blunt:  Going from a digital store to a physical one is rough.   There are problems doing from a format where you only need to change a few lines of code when certain criteria to having to manufacture, sell and distribute physical objects.  It happened with Urf, too.

There are plenty of reasons why Riot would run out of that Thresh figure:

1.  Underestimated demand.  Could happen.
2.  Budget.  The merch team could have made all the figures they could afford.

Still sucks that you have to wait for a chance at one, though.
Danke Schon Sarutobi. If I'm correct in my thinking that should be around 8AM my time. EDIT: it shall be 10AM my time lol

Yes 7am PST so you would need to find out what timezone you are in and convert it from there. I know for me it would be about 3-4am on the 1st.

Still got some time left. Really hoping to snag one as well along with the Gnar Plushie!
its not going to be released (as well as the other things related to the 2015 Worlds Merch) until tomorrow at 7am Pst.
So 7AM Pst. Oct 1. cause technically its the first for me right now lol
